title: bicf/sra_pipeline pipeline parameters
description: This pipeline is a simple method for downloading bulk SRA data, and renaming it, and having it ready to use in our other Astrocyte pipelines BICF at UT Southwestern Dept. of Bioinformatics.

designFile.description: Tab-separated file containing information about the samples to download
designFile.help_text: You will need to create a design file with information about the samples in your experiment before running the pipeline.

output.description: The output directory where the results will be saved.
